Class: GestureEmitter

GestureEmitter

<abstract> new GestureEmitter(element, options)

Base class for gesture emitters
Parameters:
Name Type Description
element Element element for which to add gesture support
options Object gesture configuration options

Name Type Description

getHammerEvents() → {undefined}

Gets the hash of hammer events to method names that the subclass is interested in. These events will be bound to the hammer instance in bindHammerEvents.
